column5: Just got back from Nakina with recommendations from Mike (Solo Paddler). Was a great trip walleye and pikeeverywhere. Nice boats, motors and cabins.Total for the week 815. My boat 375. Largest pike 38"......Largest walleye 29"

Corvette,Congrats on the good numbers and on the big walleye. I'll be up there Aug. 11-18. Curious to the depths where you were finding the bigger pike? Any particular go-to lure? Glad you had a good trip.

looks like it was a great trip. I cant believe how low the water levels are. When we were there at Howards in mid-june all that dock was at water level. I assume your stay with Howard was a good one? Also did Howard get a new bbq? Most of the fish were caught in deeper water on structure?
yes he got a new bbq. find a hump you cought fish 18-24ft saw the water line on the rocks it was low still great fishing
Awesome trip Doug, glad it went well. VERY glad to hear there's a new bbq.
